price: तथा हमने उसे एक लाख की ओर भेजा, बल्कि वे अधिक होंगे।
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِاْئَةِ أَلۡفٍ أَوۡ يَزِيدُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnāhu ilā mi-ati alfin aw yazīdūna
